      void Ride.update(Station arrivalStation, MyDate date)
      This method updates a ride when the user has arrived at a station and has put the bicycle there : It sets the arrival Station, the arrival date, computes the cost of the ride and updates some statistics about the user

    • Uses of MyDate in myVelibStationNetwork

      void Stations.notifyObservers(Bicycle bicycle, Station arrivalStation, MyDate date)
      This method looks for the observer (ie the unfinished ride) in which the Bicycle bicycle is used.
      void Station.notifyObservers(Bicycle bicycle, Station arrivalStation, MyDate date)
      When a bike is returned to a station, it means that an unfinished ride has just ended.
      double ParkingSlot.occupationRate(MyDate startDate, MyDate endDate)
      This method computes the occupation rate of this parking slot
      java.lang.String UserTerminal.returnBicycle(Bicycle bicycle, MyDate date)
      This method allows a user to restore a bike to the station and most importantly to let the system know that his/her ride is over. and to know about the cost of the ride.
